item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - V.A. K-Drama OSTs [FLAC] - 2
item.description:
Hi!
I'd appreciate it if anyone could share some of these V.A. K-Drama OSTs in FLAC (Qobuz/Tidal) and Lossy. Tysm!

1. Kim Soo Hyun (김수현) - Promise (My Love From The Star OST Special)

https://tidal.com/browse/album/326032312

2. Paul Kim (폴김) - Can't Get Over You (Queen of Tears OST Part. 6)

https://tidal.com/browse/album/355091631

3. 10cm - Tell Me It's Not a Dream (Queen of Tears OST Part. 2)

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/q...DF*MTcxMjQzODEwMy4xLjAuMTcxMjQzODEwMy4wLjAuMA..

4. Leebada (이바다) - Dreams (Was It Love? OST Part. 1)

https://tidal.com/browse/album/334931741

5. Aalia (알리아) - Adrenaline (Italian Vers.) [VINCENZO OST Part. 2]

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/v...DF*MTcxMjQzODk0Mi4xLjAuMTcxMjQzODk0Mi4wLjAuMA..

6. Aalia (알리아) - Is This Love [VINCENZO OST Part. 5]

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/v...DF*MTcxMjQzODk0Mi4xLjEuMTcxMjQzODk2Mi4wLjAuMA..

7. Seo In Guk (서인국) - Flower (Tomorrow With You OST Part. 1) [Itunes Plus AAC M4A]*

https://music.apple.com/id/album/flower/1205340634?i=1205340635
*Note: Can't find the song in FLAC
